name: Haunter
author: Ken Sugimori
flavor_text: Because of its ability to slip through block walls, it is said to be from another dimension.

abilities.name: Transparency
abilities.effect: Whenever an attack does anything to Haunter, flip a coin. If heads, prevent all effects of that attack, including damage, done to Haunter. This power stops working while Haunter is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Nightmare
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.
